introduction.p: This document details the procedure for installing a bicycle stem. It outlines preliminary requirements, the main procedure, and closing requirements.

safetyprecautions.caution: Do not overtighten the stem bolt. Overtightening can damage the headset bearings.
The stem bolt does not secure the stem.
safetyprecautions.note: Ensure the stem is aligned forward in line with the wheel.

prerequisites.p: Ensure the bicycle is securely mounted on a work stand with the front wheel free of the ground.

cleaning.p: Remove all rust and corrosion using a clean dry cloth and rubbing alcohol.

lubrication.content: Apply general lubricant to the following:

list.item: The threads of the stem and stem bolt.

alignmenttightening.content: Adjust the stem to align with the wheel. Firmly tighten the stem bolt.
